pages.text: The Chthonic Cathedral is a structure found within Terramity, and is required to fight the final boss.$(br2)The structure can be found only on the roof of the Nether.

$(l:terramity:bosses/shadow_wizards)The Shadow Wizards$() can be summoned by right clicking the pedestal found within the court with occult fabric, dropped from enemies found within the $(l:terramity:structures/chthonic_dungeon)Chthonic Dungeon$().
